DOC.brief_title: Neutrophil-to-Lymphocyte Ratio Bladder Cancer : A Secondary Biomarker Analysis SWOG 8710
DOC.criteria: 1 . SWOG 8710 original trial inclusion criterion include : Nodenegative , muscleinvasive transitional cell carcinoma bladder , T2T4aN0M0 per AJCC 4th edition stag manual . SWOG performance status 0 1 Adequate organ function lab criterion ( WBC > 4,000 cells/mm3 , platelet > 150,000 cells/mm3 , creatinine < 1.5 md/dL ( men ) < 1.3 md/dL ( woman ) , baseline liver test < 2 time normal limit ) 2 . Inclusion criterion secondary analysis : Eligible original SWOG 8710 trial Had complete blood count differential prior first treatment ( radical cystectomy NAC ) . 1 . SWOG 8710 original trial exclusion criterion include : No age restriction Previous concomitant malignancy bladder cancer basal cell skin cancer Prior pelvic radiation Metastatic incurable disease Laboratory value exceed detail 3.1.c 2 . Exclusion criterion secondary analysis : Ineligibility original SWOG 8710 study Lack complete blood count differential prior first treatment ( cystectomy NAC ) .
